Package com.company

Class Character

java.lang.Object
com.company.Elements
com.company.Character
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bullet, LawnMower, Plant, Zombie
public class Character
extends Elements
This is character class. this class extends Elements Also Zombie Class and Plant class extends from this class Hp field means healthPoint and show the life of plants and zombies
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mahdi Rahmani & Nami Modarresi
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • Character

      public Character​(int[] position, int HP, java.lang.String elementPath, GameState gameState, int width, int height, int speed)
      This is constructor of this class It calls the constructor of superclass and pass the needed argument as an entry If we call this create a new Character class
      Parameters:
      position - the x&y coordinates
      HP - The health point
      elementPath - the path of element gif or image
      gameState - the game state
      width - the width of object
      height - the height of object
